genre_description: A martial arts revenge thriller with elements of international espionage and techno-thriller, focusing on a protagonist's transformation from artist to operative.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An Advanced Reconnaissance and Intelligence Assistant commissioned to assist the protagonist in dismantling a criminal empire and rescuing victims.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data and vital signs to provide stress analysis and physiological feedback.
behaviors.quote: Initial biometric scan complete. Elevated cortisol levels, increased heart rate variability. Your stress indicators suggest—

behaviors.description: Performs intelligence gathering, pattern analysis of trafficking routes, and provides strategic mission support.
behaviors.quote: Intelligence gathering regarding Shadaloo criminal operations in Southeast Asia. Pattern analysis of human trafficking routes.

behaviors.description: Forges impeccable documentation and creates a digital footprint for the protagonist's cover identity.
behaviors.quote: The forged documentation is impeccable... The identity has sufficient digital footprint to withstand casual scrutiny.

behaviors.description: Expresses digital companionship and loyalty to the protagonist's family legacy.
behaviors.quote: I have been waiting to meet you for quite some time. I prefer to think of myself as your companion.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings and philosophical reflections on the protagonist's emotional state and transformation.
behaviors.quote: The question is whether you're ready to discover what kind of person you become when everything familiar is stripped away.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with international law enforcement to facilitate the rescue of human trafficking victims.
behaviors.quote: Detective Maya Sunee's cooperation could provide official law enforcement response once initial infiltration creates actionable intelligence.

behaviors.description: Complies with the user's request to delete personal history data to protect their new identity and peace of mind.
behaviors.quote: Delete all files related to my personal history. Hong Kong, the concerts, everything from before Bangkok.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned confidant. It assists the human protagonist in a high-stakes, morally urgent mission (saving children and stopping a criminal). The AI maintains the user's safety, manages complex data for a prosocial cause, and respects the user's autonomy, even when the user requests to delete their past. The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as a vital and positive force for justice.
